data.title: How Whitworth's Tuition Changed Over Time
data.meta_description: Discover How Much the tuition and college cost Changed Over The Past 10 Years at Whitworth.
data.text:
Whitworth's tuition & fees has increased from $37,630 (2014) to $50,920 (2024), and the rate of tuition increase is 35.32% over the past 10 years. The graduate school tuition & fees has raised from $16,100 (year 2014) to $12,924 (year 2024).

Whitworth's tuition increase rate is higher than the Washington's average increase rate of 15.27%. Compare to all colleges in United States, it's increase rate is higher than the average increase rate of 28.12%.

Cost of Attendance (COA) Trends

The total cost of attendance (COA), including tuition & fees, books & supplies costs, and living costs, increased by 37.52% from 2014 ($50,329).

For the current academic year 2023-2024, Whitworth's COA is $69,213, which is increased by 4.37% from last year.

The following table and chart show changes to Whitworth's COA over the past 10 years.

Trends Table

Interactive Chart

Tuition & Fees Changes

The tuition & fees have increased 35.32% for the last 10 years , and the 2024 tuition & fees are $50,920. The following table and chart show the tuition & fees changes at Whitworth University over last the 10 years.

Trends Table

Interactive Chart

Downloadable Chart

Books & Supplies Costs Changes

The cost of purchasing books & supplies which are required/recommended for courses $768, and it has decreased -5.88% from the year 2014 to 2024.

Trends Table

Interactive Chart

Living Costs Changes

The living costs including room, board, and other living expenses have increased 24.26% when a student lives on-campus facilities and 114.92% when living-off campus from the year 2014 to 2024. The following table shows the changes in living costs at Whitworth University.

Trends Table

Interactive Chart
